example.parse: (S (VP (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الامر)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS ليس) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC مؤكداً)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC السفارة)) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN بيروت)))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS اجرت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC اتصالاً)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN أحد) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN المسؤولين))))) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لاستفسار)) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الفنادق) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحجز))) (PP-TMP (PREP منذ) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الآن))) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اعضاء) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN وفد) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN القمة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الدورية)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ_NUM+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الرابعة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC عشرة)))))))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: because the embassy in Beirut had contacted an official to inquire about hotels and reservations from now for members of her delegation to the summit fourteenth periodic

example.arg: لان السفارة في بيروت اجرت اتصالاً بأحد المسؤولين للاستفسار عن الفنادق والحجز منذ الآن لاعضاء وفد ها الى القمة الدورية الرابعة عشرة
